00004 int getpath(const char *src, char *dest, int max_chars) {
00005         int dest_size = 0;
00006         int i = 0;
00007         
00008         if(!src || !dest) return 0;
00009         if(max_chars < 0 || max_chars > MAX_STRING_SIZE) {
00010                 #ifdef DEBUG
00011                 printf("WARNING: INVALID max_chars SENT TO readline()!!!\n");
00012                 #endif
00013                 return 0;
00014         }
00015         
00016         strncpy(dest, src, max_chars);
00017         dest_size = strlen(dest);
00018         i = dest_size-1;
00019 
00020         while(i >= 0 && dest[i] != '/') {
00021                 dest[i] = 0;
00022                 i--;
00023         }
00024         
00025         return i;
00026         
00027 }

00030 int getfile(const char *path, char *filename, int max_chars) {
00031         int i = 0;
00032         int j = 0;
00033         
00034         if(!path || !filename) return 0;
00035         if(max_chars < 0 || max_chars > MAX_STRING_SIZE) {
00036                 #ifdef DEBUG
00037                 printf("WARNING: INVALID max_chars SENT TO readline()!!!\n");
00038                 #endif
00039                 return 0;
00040         }
00041         
00042         i = strlen(path);
00043 
00044         // Find the slash
00045         while(i > 0 && path[i] != '/') {
00046                 i--;
00047         }
00048         
00049         // It's not a path
00050         if(i == 0) return 0;
00051         
00052         j = 0;
00053         i++; // I don't want the slash
00054         while(path[i] != 0) {
00055                 filename[j] = path[i];
00056                 i++;
00057                 j++;
00058         }
00059         
00060         return j;
00061         
00062 }

00065 int fileexists(const DIR *dir, const char *filename) {
00066         int len = strlen(filename);
00067         struct dirent *dp;
00068         
00069         while((dp = readdir((DIR*)dir)) != NULL) {
00070                 if(strlen(dp->d_name) == len && !strcmp(dp->d_name, filename)) {
00071                         return 1;
00072                 }
00073         }
00074         
00075         return 0;
00076 }
00077 
00082 int direxists(const char *path) {
00083         DIR *dir = NULL;
00084         int d = 0;
00085         dir = opendir(path);
00086         if(dir) {
00087                 d++;
00088                 closedir(dir);
00089         }
00090         return d;
00091 }
